body:
Hey guys. I've been playing alot of counter strike lately, and I'm looking for some more friends to queue with. I'm currently only a gold Nova 3, but I'd say that's decent for being rank 9 :^) If any of you are gn2-mg and want to play some competitives you can add my steam: Smittay.

Also, if you guys have any cool boosts/strategies/screenshots I'm interested to hear them!

(I'm trying to get better at more maps, too. I only know cache, mirage, and dust2.)
body_tagged:
